channel.title: [Yellow and Blue] Donator Capes [Blue and White]
channel.description:
[b]I got sick of all the Donator Cape Request so here they are.[/b]
~Downloads~ Yellow and Blue: [url=http://uppit.com/v/GI7MLFPX]http://uppit.com/v/GI7MLFPX[/url] White and Blue: [url=http://uppit.com/v/QKSQGMQL]http://uppit.com/v/QKSQGMQL[/url]
Pictures: [img]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/BlueAndYellowDonatorCape.jpg[/img] [img]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/WhiteandBlue.jpg[/img]
I would say theres no Virus on them but then that would Sounds suspisious, so you'll just have to Trust me.
I know there recolours but hopefully this will stop a little Requests.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Silent CJ's version its pwnage!
[quote="SilentCJ"]Here's another one i released a few hours back, fully manually animated with drop models, ints etc.
[quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=377412.msg2842363#msg2842363 date=1246046335] Here you go, proof of a custom animated model, without using the preset animations.
Here's an in game, with some fist of guthix shizz.
[img]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Moneycape.png[/img]
[img]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/MoneyCape-1.jpg[/img]
And the download : http://www.mediafire.com/?ts4upgnl8xkpa9u
And the ints...
[code] if(i == 15189) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 14200; //Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 14201; //Male class8.anInt200 = 14201; //Female class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.aString170 = "Money cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Its A money cape".getBytes(); } [/code]
Remember to add the models to the folder, then go in game and say: [quote] add model 14200 add model 14201 [/quote]
Or: [quote] add models [/quote] Depending on which command you have added.
And also, server side, item.java, add the id, 15189 in the capes section of the file, and also do the same for item4.java.
Re compile everything, and run it all again.
[/quote][/quote]

@krackkid wrote:

wouldnt it be like,

I think!

Like, moderator is 1, admin 2, owner 3, donator 4 or something, I don’t know the exact variables for it but it has something to do with the power of a person on your server xD

item.title: [Yellow and Blue] Donator Capes [Blue and White]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Here’s another one i released a few hours back, fully manually animated with drop models, ints etc.

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:23, topic:285574”]Here you go, proof of a custom animated model, without using the preset animations.

Here’s an in game, with some fist of guthix shizz.

And the download : http://uppit.com/v/D32KKLTC

And the ints…

if(i == 15189) {
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";
class8.anInt174 = 14200; //Inv & Ground
class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom
class8.anInt190 = 572;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 14201; //Male
class8.anInt200 = 14201; //Female
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable
class8.aString170 = "Money cape";
class8.aByteArray178 = "Its A money cape".getBytes();
}

Remember to add the models to the folder, then go in game and say:

add model 14200
add model 14201

Or:

add models

Depending on which command you have added.

And also, server side, item.java, add the id, 15189 in the capes section of the file, and also do the same for item4.java.

Re compile everything, and run it all again.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: [Yellow and Blue] Donator Capes [Blue and White]

item.title: [Yellow and Blue] Donator Capes [Blue and White]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I got sick of all the Donator Cape Request so here they are.

~Downloads~
Yellow and Blue: http://uppit.com/v/GI7MLFPX
White and Blue: http://uppit.com/v/QKSQGMQL

Pictures:

I would say theres no Virus on them but then that would Sounds suspisious, so you’ll just have to Trust me.

I know there recolours but hopefully this will stop a little Requests.


Silent CJ's version its pwnage!

[quote="SilentCJ"]Here's another one i released a few hours back, fully manually animated with drop models, ints etc.

[quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=377412.msg2842363#msg2842363 date=1246046335]
Here you go, proof of a custom animated model, without using the preset animations.

Here's an in game, with some fist of guthix shizz.

[img]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Moneycape.png[/img]

[img]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/MoneyCape-1.jpg[/img]

And the download : http://www.mediafire.com/?ts4upgnl8xkpa9u

And the ints...

[code]
if(i == 15189) {
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";
class8.anInt174 = 14200; //Inv & Ground
class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom
class8.anInt190 = 572;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 14201; //Male
class8.anInt200 = 14201; //Female
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable
class8.aString170 = "Money cape";
class8.aByteArray178 = "Its A money cape".getBytes();
}
[/code]


Remember to add the models to the folder, then go in game and say:
[quote]
add model 14200
add model 14201
[/quote]

Or:
[quote]
add models
[/quote]
Depending on which command you have added.

And also, server side, item.java, add the id, 15189 in the capes section of the file, and also do the same for item4.java.

Re compile everything, and run it all again.

[/quote][/quote]
